name: Touhou Fangame ~ The Destruction of the Moon
name_original: Touhou Fangame ~ The Destruction of the Moon
description:
This is the Browser Version of the Game. 

Lunatic mode is exclusive to the Download Version.

---Story--------------------------------------------

This game's events occur during the events of my 5th 
touhou fangame (Incident in Scarlet Mansion) which 
takes place a little after my 4th touhou fangame 
(Double Liar). The team (spoilers) came on Gensokyo
a day before the events of Double Liar. This game is
also a prequel to SUiP. If you haven't played any of
these it's ok, it wont change much. 
Sanae is on her way hame after going shopping.
That's how the game starts. The rest is in the game.

---Manual-------------------------------------------

#  You move with the arrows.
#  You shoot enemies with Z.
#  You focus (go slower) with X.
#  You can use different bombs with A,S,D buttons.
#   Press C for a random bomb.
#   Collect power (red) items to increase your power!
#   Collect score (blue) items to increase your score!
#   Collect bomb (green) items to increase your bomb points! 
    (Each bomb costs 10-20 bomb points)
#   You don't have lives but getting hit is being counted 
    and your bonus score will be decreased.
#   Collect star like items to increase your eclipsepoints
#   Each eclipse point is worth 10.000 points!!!
#   In the music room press Z to play a song.
#   Or press C to mute.
#   The Hiscore system will be updated every time a 
    player passes the previous Hiscore.

---Other--------------------------------------------

If you play the Download Version there's a hidden stage in
Lunatic, to get there you have to beat the 4th boss and having 
hits less that 30. There are also some more secrets in that 
version~
...and Lunatic mode has more spellcards too.
